Name: White Glass Bead
Description: Perfect Dodge applies a SHIELD for 15% of Max Health. Lasts 10s. Cannot Stack with itself.
Location: Acquired by insisting Leywise eat the Feast Master's Leftovers given to you by the Feastmaster in The Great Hall assuming you've met Leywise prior to the conversation on the same world roll of The Awakened King DLC. This also unlocks an Achievement called A Foul Feast.
